About, Contact, Privacy Policy

Welcome to PersistPal.com! ðŸ§Ÿ

Years ago I created a fansite called 'TibiaPal' for the game 'Tibia', also developed by CipSoft (developer of Persist Online).
TibiaPal has grown massively over the years, at the time of writing receiving approx. 5M visits/year.

This brings us here! I decided to try out Persist Online and fell in love with it - so I decided to create this fansite to help the community of Persist.

I plan to continue working on both sites (and my YouTube channel!) for the forseeable future so if you have any ideas or requests for tools/guides - send me a message in game or via Discord!

Much love and see you in Persist! ðŸ’–

Yours,
Kusnier

In case of any issues, questions, comments or suggestions, please feel free to reach out to me using any of the methods below.

You can email me at kusnier.business@gmail.com

You can find me on Discord, username: 'Kusnier'

You can contact me via our Discord server, discord.gg/kbjqY2VRa9

Privacy Policy for https://persistpal.com

If you require any more information or have any questions about our privacy policy, please feel free to contact us by email at kusnier.business@gmail.com.

At https://persistpal.com, the privacy of our visitors is of extreme importance to us. This privacy policy document outlines the types of personal information is received and collected by https://persistpal.com and how it is used.

Log Files
Like many other Web sites, https://persistpal.com makes use of log files. The information inside the log files includes internet protocol ( IP ) addresses, type of browser, Internet Service Provider ( ISP ), date/time stamp, referring/exit pages, and number of clicks to analyze trends, administer the site, track users movement around the site, and gather demographic information. IP addresses, and other such information are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable.

Cookies and Web Beacons
https://persistpal.com does use cookies to store information about visitors preferences, record user-specific information on which pages the user access or visit, customize Web page content based on visitors browser type or other information that the visitor sends via their browser.

Some of our advertising partners may use cookies and web beacons on our site. Our advertising partners include Google Adsense and Ezoic (//g.ezoic.net/privacy/persistpal.com).

Users may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Ads Settings

These third-party ad servers or ad networks use technology to the advertisements and links that appear on https://persistpal.com send directly to your browsers. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. Other technologies ( such as cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons ) may also be used by the third-party ad networks to measure the effectiveness of their advertisements and / or to personalize the advertising content that you see.

https://persistpal.com has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.

You should consult the respective privacy policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information on their practices as well as for instructions about how to opt-out of certain practices. https://persistpal.com's privacy policy does not apply to, and we cannot control the activities of, such other advertisers or web sites.

If you wish to disable cookies, you may do so through your individual browser options. More detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers can be found at the browsers' respective websites.
